title: TUI Task Selection Visibility Improvements
description:
Improve visibility of selected task in TUI, especially when focus moves between panes.

## Problems

1. When focus moves to details pane, the cursor in task list disappears - user loses context of which task is selected
2. No indication in status pane of which task is currently displayed
3. Details pane doesn't show task ID and title header

## Goals

- Always clear which task is selected/displayed
- Task context visible regardless of focused pane
- Consistent task identification (ID + title) across panes
